name: Pour-to-win
description:
This game is rated "M" for Miracle.
You play as ordinary NPC/Bartender in a yet another Wild West Crossover. 

Pour for you life as fast as you can.

Controls :

AD (Left Stick) - move left/right

QE (LB, RB) - pour Whiskey (Q) or Beer (E)  (pay attention to the client's request and use a proper drink)

 R (RT) - re-initialize the whole Universe

Credits :

Mykhailo Novoseltsev - 3D art

Vitalii Zavoloka - code

Vlad Melnyk - music
